column2: "Seeing the effort of you young people, I feel like the passion from the time of my active duty has been reborn."
"Just at the moment, we are chronically shorthanded. I'm thinking about resuming my work as an ARKS for a while."
"So, that's it. Would you let me test your true ability one time?"
"In that event, I will entrust my back to you. Please give it your all."
